What are you looking for? Advanced Search Home > All Categories > Food&Drink > Other - Food&Drink > Resolved Question JEREMY B Member since: February 08, 2009 Total points: 80 (Level 1) Add Contact Block
Resolved Question Show me another » Can someone help me name my food business? My biggest money maker will be catering. i will also run a vegetable stand in the summer. I will sell my home canned products from my restaurant. I want to have a name that involves everything i do. I have ten acres of land i can farm for the vegetable stand and the restaurant will only be a kitchen to do caterings and run my farm stand. I also want to smoke pork but and briskets and sell them to order. can some one give me some great ideas or a website to look at that will help me. 3 years ago Report Abuse by Nikki P Member since: April 06, 2008 Total points: 56,742 (Level 7) Badge Image: Add Contact Block
Best Answer - Chosen by Voters There are lots of good ideas for names that have been listed. I would caution you to start your business focusing on doing a few things well rather than attempting to do all things. If you begin with the farm stand and have some of your BBQ going you will have people stopping to sample both. The catering can branch from there. Possibly offer to do picnics, pig roasts and the like. The catering will take off from there. Good luck the food service industry can be a hard one to succeed in. 3 years ago Report Abuse 100% 1 Vote 1 person rated this as good
